Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class AvoidObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.AvoidObstacle
  • public class AvoidObstacle
extends java.lang.Object
    The AvoidObstacle helps the robot to avoid the obstacle using ultrasonic and wall follower.
    Author:
    Narry Zendehrooh, Sean Smith

    • Method Detail

      • avoid

        public static void avoid​(ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point startPoint,
                         ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point endPoint)
        The starting point of obstacle avoidance. When detects the obstacle stops and applies wall follower until it joins back the path.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - starting point right before the obstacle
        endPoint - the destination point of the waypoint

      • decideLeftRight

        public static int decideLeftRight()
        Decides whether the robot should go left or right. uses the distance from left and right wall and chooses the direction which is further from the wall.
        Returns:
        decision going left or right

      • wallFollow

        public static void wallFollow​(double[] slopeParams,
                              ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point startPoint,
                              ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point endPoint)
        A modified version of wall follower from lab 1 which terminates when the robot passed the obstacle. The robot follows the wall until it joins back to the waypoint path.
        Parameters:
        slopeParams - the slope and y-intercept of the path
        startPoint - the point before starting the obstacle avoidance

      • checkIfPointOnSlope

        public static boolean checkIfPointOnSlope​(ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point start,
                                          ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point curr,
                                          double[] params)
        Checking if the robot joined back the path using equation of the line.
        Parameters:
        start - starting point before going off the path
        curr - the current position of the robot
        Returns:
        true if it is back to the path

      • getLinearSlope

        public static double[] getLinearSlope​(ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point p1,
                                      ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield.Point p2)
        Measure the linear slope between two points.
        Parameters:
        p1 - first point
        p2 - second point
        Returns:
        params has the slope and y-intercept

      • setMotorSpeeds

        public static void setMotorSpeeds()
        Sets the speeds of the left and right motors from the motorSpeeds array.

      • controller

        public static void controller​(int distance,
                              int[] motorSpeeds)
        Process a movement based on the US distance passed in Bang-Bang.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to the wall in cm
        motorSpeeds - output parameter you need to set

      • correctController

        public static void correctController()
        Correcting the controller depending on turning left or right. The position and orientation of the robot will be adjusted depending on turning left or right.

      • turnUsMotor

        public static void turnUsMotor​(int amount)
        turning the ultrasonic motor by the passed amount in degree.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount by which to turn the motor.

      • usReturnToDefault

        public static void usReturnToDefault()
        return motor to be facing forwards.

      • readUsDistance

        public static int readUsDistance()
        Returns the filtered distance between the US sensor and an obstacle in cm.

      • filter

        public static int filter​(int[] arr)
        Rudimentary filter - toss out invalid samples corresponding to null signal.
        Parameters:
        arr - raw distance array measured by the sensor in cm
        Returns:
        distance filtered distance in cm
